title: Marco’s Pizza Locations – Find a Marco’s Near You & Order
text: Marco’s Pizza Locations and Store Map: A Comprehensive Guide Marco’s Pizza, founded in 1978 by Pasquale “Pat” Giammarco in Toledo, Ohio, has grown into one of the fastest-growing pizza chains in the United States. With more than 1,200 locations across 35 states, including Puerto Rico, the Bahamas, and Mexico, Marco’s offers a diverse menu with specialty pizzas, subs, wings, salads, and more. This expansion marks their commitment to providing customers with delicious, freshly made pizzas and a unique dining experience wherever they are. Marco’s Pizza offers something for everyone, whether you’re in a big city or a small town. Official Store Locator: Marco’s Pizza has made it easier than ever to find a store near you. The official store locator on the Marco’s Pizza website allows you to simply enter your ZIP code or city, and it will show you the nearest Marco’s Pizza outlets along with their operating hours, contact information, and even specific details about the location’s offerings. This locator helps customers quickly find a location to satisfy their pizza cravings, whether they’re in a metropolitan area or traveling through a small town. Number of Locations by State: As of 2025, Marco’s Pizza operates in 35 states and territories across the U.S., with the highest concentrations of stores in certain regions. Below is a breakdown of the top five states with the most Marco’s Pizza locations: These states contribute to over half of Marco’s total store count, demonstrating the brand’s widespread appeal. In particular, Texas stands out with 198 locations, which account for nearly 16% of all stores, followed closely by Florida with 162 locations. Ohio, another key state for Marco’s, houses 142 stores. Cities with the Most Marco’s Pizza Locations: Some cities in the U.S. have become home to a large number of Marco’s Pizza locations, allowing residents to enjoy convenience and variety. Below is a list of cities with a significant number of Marco’s Pizza outlets: These cities have multiple Marco’s locations, ensuring that residents have quick access to delicious pizza, subs, wings, and other menu items. Delivery and Service Areas: - Expanded Delivery Reach: Marco’s Pizza offers delivery to a wide variety of locations, extending its reach to both urban and suburban areas. Many stores offer free delivery, making it an appealing option for those who want to enjoy a fresh pizza at home. Depending on the location, delivery areas may cover nearby neighborhoods, ensuring customers can enjoy Marco’s pizza no matter where they are. - Regional Service Areas: Each Marco’s Pizza location has specific service areas, meaning the delivery zones can vary. For example, in densely populated cities like New York and Miami, multiple stores ensure fast delivery. In smaller towns, a single location may serve larger surrounding areas. The store locator on Marco’s website helps customers check delivery availability by entering their postal code. Expansion in New Markets: - Plans for Future Locations: Marco’s Pizza has aggressive plans for expansion in the coming years. In addition to the opening of new stores in existing markets, the brand is eyeing expansion into states and cities that are currently underserved by Marco’s locations. This includes exploring opportunities in high-growth areas like Texas, Arizona, and Nevada. - International Locations: While Marco’s Pizza is predominantly a U.S.-based chain, its reach is growing internationally. Puerto Rico, Mexico, and the Bahamas are currently part of Marco’s international presence. There are plans for further expansion into other parts of the Caribbean and possibly into Canada, offering their signature pizzas to a more global audience. Local Store Promotions and Events: - Regional Deals: Marco’s Pizza offers different promotional deals depending on location. For example, some areas may have local discounts or specials tailored to the tastes of the community. This could include special pricing on large pizzas, exclusive local toppings, or even collaborations with local businesses. - Community Events and Sponsorships: Many Marco’s Pizza locations engage in community activities, such as sponsoring local sports teams, hosting charity events, or organizing pizza nights in support of local schools and organizations. These initiatives help strengthen the brand’s relationship with customers in specific locations. Localized Menu Options: - Region-Specific Toppings: In some areas, Marco’s Pizza locations may offer region-specific toppings or flavor profiles to cater to local preferences. For example, certain locations in the South might offer more spicy options or regional ingredients like smoked meats, while locations in California may feature fresh vegetables or unique herb blends. These localized menu items help Marco’s stay relevant in various communities. Distribution of Marco’s Pizza Locations: - Growth Across Regions: Marco’s Pizza is experiencing rapid growth in specific regions. For instance, Southern states like Florida and Texas have seen an influx of new Marco’s Pizza locations, largely due to the brand’s popularity for quick, reliable pizza and takeout service. Cities with booming populations and high demand for fast food are especially prime locations for new store openings. - Market Penetration: While Marco’s Pizza has established a strong presence in the Eastern U.S., the Western U.S. and Midwest are also seeing an increasing number of store openings. This demonstrates Marco’s strategy to diversify its locations and cater to growing demand in various parts of the country. Marco’s Pizza and Franchise Locations: - Franchise Opportunities: Marco’s Pizza has a well-established franchise model that allows entrepreneurs to open their own locations in various parts of the U.S. and beyond. Franchise owners can benefit from Marco’s proven operational systems, brand recognition, and marketing support. This has led to rapid expansion, with the brand continuing to add more locations through franchised stores. - Support for Franchisees: Marco’s provides comprehensive support to franchise owners, including assistance with site selection, store design, training, and ongoing operational support. This ensures that each new location is set up for success and can deliver the same quality of service and products that customers expect from the brand. Locating Marco’s Pizza on the Go: - Mobile App and Store Locator: For those constantly on the move, the Marco’s Pizza mobile app and store locator make finding a nearby location quick and easy. The app not only helps you locate stores, but also allows you to place orders, track deliveries, and access exclusive promotions. This feature is perfect for travelers who need a quick and easy pizza fix on the go. Visualizing Marco’s Pizza Locations: To better understand the distribution of Marco’s Pizza locations across the country, resources like interactive maps and downloadable location databases are invaluable. These tools help visualize the extensive network of Marco’s Pizza outlets, showing how widely the brand has expanded over the years. Whether you’re looking for a store in a big city or a remote area, you can easily access up-to-date maps and store details to find the nearest location. These resources provide detailed information, including contact details, operational hours, and specific store offerings, ensuring customers can always get the most accurate information. Recent Openings and Expansions: Marco’s Pizza continues to grow, with recent expansions into new areas. Below are some of the new store openings: - Midland, TX: A new Marco’s Pizza is set to open at 3328 N. Midkiff Road, marking the brand’s first presence in the Tall City. The store is expected to open in the fall of 2025. - Beaumont, TX: A new location has opened at 414 Dowlen Rd. This store is known for making dough fresh in-house daily, distinguishing it from competitors. - Meridian, ID: A test location has introduced a new store design emphasizing technological innovations and reducing human interaction. Features include QR codes for mobile access and pizza lockers for pick-up. - These recent openings showcase Marco’s commitment to expanding its reach and serving new customers with high-quality, delicious pizza. Marco’s Pizza Menu Highlights: Marco’s Pizza is renowned for its wide variety of pizzas, which cater to different tastes and dietary preferences. Here are some of the menu items that customers love: Specialty Pizzas: - White Cheezy - Chicken Florentine - Pepperoni Magnifico - Chicken Fresco - Spicy Fresco - Double Pepperoni Spicy Fresco Pizza Bowls: - A low-carb alternative to traditional pizza, customizable with various toppings. Subs: - Italian-style sandwiches available in various flavors. Wings: - Available in multiple sauces and heat levels. Sides: - CheezyBread - CinnaSquares - Ghirardelli brownies - Whether you’re craving a classic pizza or something unique, Marco’s menu has something to satisfy every taste. Conclusion: Marco’s Pizza offers a wide variety of menu options to satisfy pizza lovers everywhere. With over 1,200 locations spread across the U.S. and other countries, it’s easy to find a Marco’s near you. The brand’s commitment to offering freshly made, high-quality pizzas and sides ensures that every customer has a great dining experience. By continually expanding and innovating, Marco’s Pizza makes it easy for everyone to enjoy their favorite pizza, whether dining in, picking up, or getting delivery. Always check the official Marco’s Pizza website or use a store locator to find the nearest location.
